Desc.entry: Offers a professional, impartial and independent language service. Covers public service (DPSI-law, local government, education) and business and conference interpreting. Offers comprehensive cultural briefings on varied subjects including: Slovak, Roma and other minorities, Eastern European migrant issues, legal language consultancy, presentation and research into working with Eastern Europeans and contemporary issues for migrants to the UK from new EU states. Also offers training for interpreters and language assessment. Teaches English and Slovak as a foreign language. Provides translation services, proofreading, research, subtitling and voiceovers. Czech and Russian also available. Qualifications - Member of Chartered Institute of Linguists (MCIL), National Register of Public Service Interpreters (NRPSI), TEFLDip, Member of Czech and Slovak Associations of Translators and Interpreters. CRB checked.
